channel.title: CVE Feed for uscnanbu -- Welcart e-Commerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for uscnanbu -- Welcart e-Commerce

item.title: CVE-2023-6120|2024-08-02T08:21:17.427Z -- uscnanbu -- welcart%20e-commerce
item.description: The Welcart e-Commerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Directory Traversal in all versions up to, and including, 2.9.6 via the upload_certificate_file function. This makes it possible for administrators to upload .pem or .crt files to arbitrary locations on the server.
